card.name: Death Gate, Gate of Hell
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy one of your opponent's untapped creatures. You may put a non-evolution creature that costs less than the destroyed creature from your graveyard into the battle zone.

card.name: Devil Hand
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures. ■ You may put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard.

card.name: Duscissor, Darma
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. That creature gets -2000 power until the End Step

card.name: Michael Gandol
card.text: ■ Whenever your Magic Tools are destroyed or put into your graveyard from under a creature, you may draw a card.

card.name: Grigyan, Darma
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When you put this creature, you may put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard.

card.name: Duglass, Darma
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Blocker ■ When this creature attacks, destroy it after the attack.

card.name: Weissing, Darma
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose a creature in your graveyard. If it's a Magic Tool that costs 4 or less, put it into the battle zone, Otherwise, put it into your hand.

card.name: Haku★Yon
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Blocker ■ When this creature attacks, destroy it after the attack. ■ When you use a "Gate of Moonless Night" ability, you may put this creature from your graveyard into the battle zone tapped.

card.name: Strong Gedor 卍
card.text: ■ Gate of Moonless Night ■ Blocker ■ Slayer ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Dumbre, Darma
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, return a card from your shield zone to your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of that shield.
